article: experts from the us centres for disease control and prevention -lrb- cdc -rrb- will visit hong kong to help strengthen training for the territory 's health workers and bolster efforts to head off future sars outbreaks , an official said thursday .
abstract: us health experts to train hk medics to help head off future sars outbreaks
